Title: Redemption
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Matthew Ross Fennell, Alice O'Neill (story editor), Randall Green (story editor), Wes Taylor (story editor)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Ben has an idea for a quick play. Chuck and Wendy play host to an unexpected guest. Axe meets with an eccentric potential investor. Chuck opens a risky new investigation. Axe and Lara make a new arrangement.
